what: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: extractox comprehensive R package designed simplify querying various chemical, toxicological, biological databases Comparative Toxicogenomics Database (CTP) MDI Biological Laboratory NC State University, Integrated Chemical Environment (ICE) National Toxicology Program (NTP), Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS) Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), CompTox Chemicals Dashboard Resource Hub (CompTox) EPA, PubChem National Center Biotechnology Information/National Institures Health (NCBI, NIH). package facilitates interaction APIs, providing curated user-friendly outputs. communicate Pubchem, extractox relies packagewebchem.

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: Install package extractox CRAN.

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: get bug fix use feature development version, can install development version extractox GitHub.
code: # Install pak if not already installed if (!requireNamespace("pak", quietly = TRUE)) {   install.packages("pak") }  # Install the package from GitHub pak::pkg_install("c1au6i0/extractox")

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: ICE database, managed EPA, provides access variety data related chemical toxicity, exposure, risk assessment. includes data high-throughput screening assays, vivo studies, computational models. extr_ice provides access NTP’s ICE database toxicological exposure-related data.
code: library(extractox) ice_data <- extr_ice(casrn = c("50-00-0"), assays = NULL) # assays is null so all assays are retrieved #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Sending request to ICE database... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200 names(ice_data) #>  [1] "assay"              "endpoint"           "substanceType"      #>  [4] "casrn"              "qsarReadyId"        "value"              #>  [7] "unit"               "species"            "receptorSpecies"    #> [10] "route"              "sex"                "strain"             #> [13] "lifeStage"          "tissue"             "lesion"             #> [16] "location"           "assaySource"        "inVitroAssayFormat" #> [19] "reference"          "referenceUrl"       "dtxsid"             #> [22] "substanceName"      "pubMedId"

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: IRIS database managed EPA contains information health effects exposure various substances found environment. provides qualitative quantitative health risk information. extr_iris provides access EPA’s IRIS database accepts queries Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number (CASRN) International Union Pure Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) names chemicals.
code: iris_info <- extr_iris(c("glyphosate", "50-00-0")) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Quering glyphosate to EPA IRIS database... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200 #> Quering 50-00-0 to EPA IRIS database... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200 names(iris_info) #> [1] "chemical_name"                 "casrn"                         #> [3] "exposure_route"                "assessment_type"               #> [5] "critical_effect_or_tumor_type" "woe_characterization"          #> [7] "toxicity_value_type"           "toxicity_value"

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: CompTox Chemistry Dashboard, managed EPA, provides access data chemical structures, properties, associated bioactivity data. integrates data various sources support chemical safety assessments. extr_comptox extracts data CompTox Chemistry Dashboard using CASRN IUPAC names chemicals returns list dataframes.
code: info_comptox <- extr_comptox(ids = c("Aspirin", "50-00-0")) #> ℹ Sending request to CompTox... #> Request succeeded with status code: 202 #> ℹ Getting info from CompTox... #>  #> Request succeeded with status code: 200 names(info_comptox) #> [1] "comptox_cover_sheet"           "comptox_main_data"             #> [3] "comptox_abstract_sifter"       "comptox_synonym_identifier"    #> [5] "comptox_related_relationships" "comptox_toxcast_assays_ac50"   #> [7] "comptox_toxval_details"        "comptox_chemical_properties"

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: function extr_tox wrapper used call -mentioned functions retrieve list dataframes.
code: info_tox <- extr_tox(casrn = c("Aspirin", "50-00-0")) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> ℹ Getting PubChem IDS... #> Querying Aspirin. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 2244. OK (HTTP 200). #> ℹ Getting PubChem IDS... #> Querying 50-00-0. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 712. OK (HTTP 200). #> ℹ Sending request to CompTox... #> Request succeeded with status code: 202ℹ Getting info from CompTox... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Sending request to ICE database...Request succeeded with status code: 200ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Quering Aspirin to EPA IRIS database...Request succeeded with status code: 200Quering 50-00-0 to EPA IRIS database...Request succeeded with status code: 200

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: CTP provides information interactions chemicals, genes, diseases. helps understanding effects environmental exposures human health. series functions interact CTP database. extr_ctd extracts information related chemical-gene pathway associations. Tetramers computationally generated information units interrelate four data types CTP: chemical, gene product, phenotype, disease. help understanding complex relationships entities combined impact human health. extr_tetramer extract info related tetramers CTD.
code: input_terms <- c("50-00-0", "64-17-5", "methanal", "ethanol") ctd_association <- extr_ctd(   input_terms = input_terms,   category = "chem",   report_type = "genes_curated",   input_term_search_type = "directAssociations",   action_types = "ANY",   ontology = c("go_bp", "go_cc") ) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Sending request to CTD database... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200   # Get expresssion data ctd_expression <- extr_ctd(   input_terms = input_terms,   report_type = "cgixns",   category = "chem",   action_types = "expression" ) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Sending request to CTD database...Request succeeded with status code: 200  names(ctd_expression) #>  [1] "x_input"             "chemical_name"       "chemical_id"         #>  [4] "cas_rn"              "gene_symbol"         "gene_id"             #>  [7] "organism"            "organism_id"         "interaction"         #> [10] "interaction_actions" "pub_med_i_ds" tetramer_data <- extr_tetramer(   chem = c("50-00-0", "ethanol"),   disease = "",   gene = "",   go = "",   input_term_search_type = "directAssociations",   qt_match_type = "equals" ) #> Sending request to CTD database for tetramer data for 50-00-0... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200 #> Sending request to CTD database for tetramer data for ethanol... #> Request succeeded with status code: 200  names(tetramer_data) #> [1] "query"        "chemical"     "chemical_id"  "gene"         "gene_id"      #> [6] "phenotype"    "phenotype_id" "disease"      "disease_id"

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: PubChem open chemistry database NIH. provides information chemical structures, identifiers, chemical physical properties, biological activities, safety toxicity information, patents, literature citations, . series functions rely webchem package used extract chemical information, Globally Harmonized System (GHS) classification data, flavor classification PubChem. function extr_chem_info retrieves chemical information IUPAC-named chemicals. warning displayed chemical found. Two functions used extract specific sections PubChem chemical information using CASRN: extr_pubchem_ghs extracts Globally Harmonized System (GHS) codes. extr_pubchem_fema extracts flavor profile data.
code: chem_info <- extr_chem_info(IUPAC_names = c("Formaldehyde", "Aflatoxin B1")) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Querying Formaldehyde. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying Aflatoxin B1. OK (HTTP 200). #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> ℹ Querying 712 and 186907. names(chem_info) #>  [1] "cid"                         "iupac_name"                  #>  [3] "cas_rn"                      "cid_all"                     #>  [5] "cas_rn_all"                  "molecular_formula"           #>  [7] "molecular_weight"            "canonical_smiles"            #>  [9] "isomeric_smiles"             "in_ch_i"                     #> [11] "in_ch_i_key"                 "iupac_name_y"                #> [13] "x_log_p"                     "exact_mass"                  #> [15] "monoisotopic_mass"           "tpsa"                        #> [17] "complexity"                  "charge"                      #> [19] "h_bond_donor_count"          "h_bond_acceptor_count"       #> [21] "rotatable_bond_count"        "heavy_atom_count"            #> [23] "isotope_atom_count"          "atom_stereo_count"           #> [25] "defined_atom_stereo_count"   "undefined_atom_stereo_count" #> [27] "bond_stereo_count"           "defined_bond_stereo_count"   #> [29] "undefined_bond_stereo_count" "covalent_unit_count"         #> [31] "volume3d"                    "x_steric_quadrupole3d"       #> [33] "y_steric_quadrupole3d"       "z_steric_quadrupole3d"       #> [35] "feature_count3d"             "feature_acceptor_count3d"    #> [37] "feature_donor_count3d"       "feature_anion_count3d"       #> [39] "feature_cation_count3d"      "feature_ring_count3d"        #> [41] "feature_hydrophobe_count3d"  "conformer_model_rmsd3d"      #> [43] "effective_rotor_count3d"     "conformer_count3d"           #> [45] "fingerprint2d"               "query" ghs_info <- extr_pubchem_ghs(casrn = c("50-00-0", "64-17-5")) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> ℹ Getting PubChem IDS... #> Querying 50-00-0. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 712. OK (HTTP 200). #> ℹ Getting PubChem IDS... #> Querying 64-17-5. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 702. OK (HTTP 200). fema_info <- extr_pubchem_fema(casrn = c("50-00-0", "123-68-2")) #> ℹ Checking Internet Connection... #> ℹ Internet connection OK... #> Querying 50-00-0. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 712. Not Found (HTTP 404). #> ℹ FEMA for 50-00-0 not found! #> Querying 123-68-2. OK (HTTP 200). #> Querying 31266. OK (HTTP 200).

title: Extract Tox Info from Various Databases
text: Please note functions pull data EPA servers may encounter issues Linux systems. servers accept secure legacy renegotiation. Linux system, functions depend curl OpenSSL, known problems unsafe legacy renegotiation newer versions. One workaround downgrade curl v7.78.0 OpenSSL v1.1.1. However, please aware using older versions might introduce potential security vulnerabilities. Refer gist instructions downgrade curl OpenSSL Ubuntu.

title: extr_casrn_from_cid — extr_casrn_from_cid
text: function retrieves CAS-RN (Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number) given set PubChem Compound Identifiers (CID). queries PubChem webchem package extracts CAS-RN depositor-supplied synonyms.

title: extr_casrn_from_cid — extr_casrn_from_cid
extr_casrn_from_cid — extr_casrn_from_cid
text: pubchem_id numeric vector PubChem CIDs. unique identifiers chemical compounds PubChem database.

title: extr_casrn_from_cid — extr_casrn_from_cid
text: data frame containing CID, CAS-RN, IUPAC name compound. returned data frame includes three columns: CID PubChem Compound Identifier. cas_rn corresponding CAS-RN compound. IUPACName IUPAC name compound.

title: extr_casrn_from_cid — extr_casrn_from_cid
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Example with formaldehyde and aflatoxin cids <- c(712, 14434) # CID for formaldehyde and aflatoxin B1 extr_casrn_from_cid(cids) } # }

title: extr_chem_info — extr_chem_info
text: function takes vector IUPAC names queries PubChem database (using webchem package) obtain corresponding CAS-RN CID compound. reshapes resulting data, ensuring compound unique row CID, CAS-RN, additional chemical properties.

title: extr_chem_info — extr_chem_info
extr_chem_info — extr_chem_info
text: IUPAC_names character vector IUPAC names. standardized names chemical compounds used search PubChem database. stop_on_warning Logical. set TRUE, function stop throw error substances found PubChem. Defaults FALSE, case warning issued.

title: extr_chem_info — extr_chem_info
text: data frame information queried compounds, including: iupac_name IUPAC name compound. cid PubChem Compound Identifier (CID). isomeric_smiles SMILES string (Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System).

title: extr_chem_info — extr_chem_info
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Example with formaldehyde and aflatoxin extr_chem_info(IUPAC_names = c("Formaldehyde", "Aflatoxin B1")) } # }

what: Download and Extract Data from CompTox Chemistry Dashboard — extr_comptox
title: Download and Extract Data from CompTox Chemistry Dashboard — extr_comptox
text: function interacts CompTox Chemistry Dashboard download extract wide range chemical data based user-defined search criteria. allows flexible input types supports downloading various chemical properties, identifiers, predictive data. inspired ECOTOXr::websearch_comptox function.

title: Download and Extract Data from CompTox Chemistry Dashboard — extr_comptox
code: extr_comptox(   ids,   download_items = c("DTXCID", "CASRN", "INCHIKEY", "IUPAC_NAME", "SMILES",     "INCHI_STRING", "MS_READY_SMILES", "QSAR_READY_SMILES", "MOLECULAR_FORMULA",     "AVERAGE_MASS", "MONOISOTOPIC_MASS", "QC_LEVEL", "SAFETY_DATA", "EXPOCAST",     "DATA_SOURCES", "TOXVAL_DATA", "NUMBER_OF_PUBMED_ARTICLES", "PUBCHEM_DATA_SOURCES",     "CPDAT_COUNT", "IRIS_LINK", "PPRTV_LINK", "WIKIPEDIA_ARTICLE", "QC_NOTES",     "ABSTRACT_SHIFTER", "TOXPRINT_FINGERPRINT", "ACTOR_REPORT", "SYNONYM_IDENTIFIER",     "RELATED_RELATIONSHIP", "ASSOCIATED_TOXCAST_ASSAYS",       "TOXVAL_DETAILS",     "CHEMICAL_PROPERTIES_DETAILS", "BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_TEST_PRED",     "BOILING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED", "48HR_DAPHNIA_LC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED",     "DENSITY_G/CM^3_TEST_PRED", "DEVTOX_TEST_PRED",     "96HR_FATHEAD_MINNOW_MOL/L_TEST_PRED", "FLASH_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED",     "MELTING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED", "AMES_MUTAGENICITY_TEST_PRED",     "ORAL_RAT_LD50_MOL/KG_TEST_PRED", "SURFACE_TENSION_DYN/CM_TEST_PRED",     "THERMAL_CONDUCTIVITY_MW/(M*K)_TEST_PRED",     "TETRAHYMENA_PYRIFORMIS_IGC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED", "VISCOSITY_CP_CP_TEST_PRED",           "VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_TEST_PRED", "WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_TEST_PRED",     "ATMOSPHERIC_HYDROXYLATION_RATE_(AOH)_CM3/MOLECULE*SEC_OPERA_PRED",     "BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_OPERA_PRED",     "BIODEGRADATION_HALF_LIFE_DAYS_DAYS_OPERA_PRED", "BOILING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED",     "HENRYS_LAW_ATM-M3/MOLE_OPERA_PRED", "OPERA_KM_DAYS_OPERA_PRED",     "OCTANOL_AIR_PARTITION_COEFF_LOGKOA_OPERA_PRED",     "SOIL_ADSORPTION_COEFFICIENT_KOC_L/KG_OPERA_PRED",     "OCTANOL_WATER_PARTITION_LOGP_OPERA_PRED", "MELTING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED",           "OPERA_PKAA_OPERA_PRED", "OPERA_PKAB_OPERA_PRED", "VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_OPERA_PRED",     "WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_OPERA_PRED",     "EXPOCAST_MEDIAN_EXPOSURE_PREDICTION_MG/KG-BW/DAY", "NHANES",     "TOXCAST_NUMBER_OF_ASSAYS/TOTAL", "TOXCAST_PERCENT_ACTIVE"),   mass_error = 0,   verify_ssl = FALSE,   ... )

title: Download and Extract Data from CompTox Chemistry Dashboard — extr_comptox
text: ids character vector containing items searched within CompTox Chemistry Dashboard. can chemical names, CAS Registry Numbers (CASRN), InChIKeys, DSSTox substance identifiers (DTXSID). download_items character vector items downloaded. includes comprehensive set chemical properties, identifiers, predictive data, relevant information. Default, download info DTXCID unique identifier chemical EPA's CompTox Chemicals Dashboard. CASRN Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number, unique numerical identifier chemical substances. INCHIKEY hashed version full International Chemical Identifier (InChI) string. IUPAC_NAME International Union Pure Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) name chemical. SMILES Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System (SMILES) representation chemical structure. INCHI_STRING full International Chemical Identifier (InChI) string. MS_READY_SMILES SMILES representation chemical structure, prepared mass spectrometry analysis. QSAR_READY_SMILES SMILES representation chemical structure, prepared quantitative structure-activity relationship (QSAR) modeling. MOLECULAR_FORMULA chemical formula representing number type atoms molecule. AVERAGE_MASS average mass molecule, calculated based isotopic distribution elements. MONOISOTOPIC_MASS mass molecule calculated using abundant isotope element. QC_LEVEL quality control level data. SAFETY_DATA Safety information related chemical. EXPOCAST Exposure predictions EPA's ExpoCast program. DATA_SOURCES Sources data provided. TOXVAL_DATA Toxicological values related chemical. NUMBER_OF_PUBMED_ARTICLES number articles related chemical PubMed. PUBCHEM_DATA_SOURCES Sources data PubChem. CPDAT_COUNT number entries Chemical Product Categories Database (CPDat). IRIS_LINK Link EPA's Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS) entry chemical. PPRTV_LINK Link EPA's Provisional Peer-Reviewed Toxicity Values (PPRTV) entry chemical. WIKIPEDIA_ARTICLE Link Wikipedia article chemical. QC_NOTES Notes related quality control data. ABSTRACT_SHIFTER Information related abstract shifter. TOXPRINT_FINGERPRINT ToxPrint chemoinformatics fingerprint chemical. ACTOR_REPORT Aggregated Computational Toxicology Resource (ACTOR) report chemical. SYNONYM_IDENTIFIER Identifiers synonyms chemical. RELATED_RELATIONSHIP Information related chemicals. ASSOCIATED_TOXCAST_ASSAYS Assays associated chemical ToxCast database. TOXVAL_DETAILS Details toxicological values. CHEMICAL_PROPERTIES_DETAILS Details chemical properties. BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_TEST_PRED Predicted bioconcentration factor tests. BOILING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted boiling point degrees Celsius tests. 48HR_DAPHNIA_LC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted 48-hour LC50 Daphnia mol/L tests. DENSITY_G/CM^3_TEST_PRED Predicted density g/cm³ tests. DEVTOX_TEST_PRED Predicted developmental toxicity tests. 96HR_FATHEAD_MINNOW_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted 96-hour LC50 fathead minnow mol/L tests. FLASH_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted flash point degrees Celsius tests. MELTING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted melting point degrees Celsius tests. AMES_MUTAGENICITY_TEST_PRED Predicted Ames mutagenicity tests. ORAL_RAT_LD50_MOL/KG_TEST_PRED Predicted oral LD50 rats mol/kg tests. SURFACE_TENSION_DYN/CM_TEST_PRED Predicted surface tension dyn/cm tests. THERMAL_CONDUCTIVITY_MW_M×K_TEST_PRED Predicted thermal conductivity mW/m×K tests. TETRAHYMENA_PYRIFORMIS_IGC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted IGC50 Tetrahymena pyriformis mol/L tests. VISCOSITY_CP_CP_TEST_PRED Predicted viscosity cP tests. VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_TEST_PRED Predicted vapor pressure mmHg tests. WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted water solubility mol/L tests. ATMOSPHERIC_HYDROXYLATION_RATE_\(AOH\)_CM3/MOLECULE\*SEC_OPERA_PRED Predicted atmospheric hydroxylation rate cm³/molecule\*sec OPERA. BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_OPERA_PRED Predicted bioconcentration factor OPERA. BIODEGRADATION_HALF_LIFE_DAYS_DAYS_OPERA_PRED Predicted biodegradation half-life days OPERA. BOILING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED Predicted boiling point degrees Celsius OPERA. HENRYS_LAW_ATM-M3/MOLE_OPERA_PRED Predicted Henry's law constant atm-m³/mole OPERA. OPERA_KM_DAYS_OPERA_PRED Predicted Km days OPERA. OCTANOL_AIR_PARTITION_COEFF_LOGKOA_OPERA_PRED Predicted octanol-air partition coefficient (log Koa) OPERA. SOIL_ADSORPTION_COEFFICIENT_KOC_L/KG_OPERA_PRED Predicted soil adsorption coefficient (Koc) L/kg OPERA. OCTANOL_WATER_PARTITION_LOGP_OPERA_PRED Predicted octanol-water partition coefficient (log P) OPERA. MELTING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED Predicted melting point degrees Celsius OPERA. OPERA_PKAA_OPERA_PRED Predicted pKa (acidic) OPERA. OPERA_PKAB_OPERA_PRED Predicted pKa (basic) OPERA. VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_OPERA_PRED Predicted vapor pressure mmHg OPERA. WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_OPERA_PRED Predicted water solubility mol/L OPERA. EXPOCAST_MEDIAN_EXPOSURE_PREDICTION_MG/KG-BW/DAY Predicted median exposure ExpoCast mg/kg-bw/day. NHANES National Health Nutrition Examination Survey data. TOXCAST_NUMBER_OF_ASSAYS/TOTAL Number assays ToxCast. TOXCAST_PERCENT_ACTIVE Percentage active assays ToxCast. mass_error Numeric value indicating mass error tolerance searches involving mass data. Default 0. verify_ssl Logical value indicating whether SSL certificates verified. Default FALSE. Note argument used linux OS. ... Additional arguments passed httr2::req_options(). Note argument used linux OS.

title: Download and Extract Data from CompTox Chemistry Dashboard — extr_comptox_
text: ids character vector containing items searched within CompTox Chemistry Dashboard. can chemical names, CAS Registry Numbers (CASRN), InChIKeys, DSSTox substance identifiers (DTXSID). download_items character vector items downloaded. includes comprehensive set chemical properties, identifiers, predictive data, relevant information. Default, download info DTXCID unique identifier chemical EPA's CompTox Chemicals Dashboard. CASRN Chemical Abstracts Service Registry Number, unique numerical identifier chemical substances. INCHIKEY hashed version full International Chemical Identifier (InChI) string. IUPAC_NAME International Union Pure Applied Chemistry (IUPAC) name chemical. SMILES Simplified Molecular Input Line Entry System (SMILES) representation chemical structure. INCHI_STRING full International Chemical Identifier (InChI) string. MS_READY_SMILES SMILES representation chemical structure, prepared mass spectrometry analysis. QSAR_READY_SMILES SMILES representation chemical structure, prepared quantitative structure-activity relationship (QSAR) modeling. MOLECULAR_FORMULA chemical formula representing number type atoms molecule. AVERAGE_MASS average mass molecule, calculated based isotopic distribution elements. MONOISOTOPIC_MASS mass molecule calculated using abundant isotope element. QC_LEVEL quality control level data. SAFETY_DATA Safety information related chemical. EXPOCAST Exposure predictions EPA's ExpoCast program. DATA_SOURCES Sources data provided. TOXVAL_DATA Toxicological values related chemical. NUMBER_OF_PUBMED_ARTICLES number articles related chemical PubMed. PUBCHEM_DATA_SOURCES Sources data PubChem. CPDAT_COUNT number entries Chemical Product Categories Database (CPDat). IRIS_LINK Link EPA's Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS) entry chemical. PPRTV_LINK Link EPA's Provisional Peer-Reviewed Toxicity Values (PPRTV) entry chemical. WIKIPEDIA_ARTICLE Link Wikipedia article chemical. QC_NOTES Notes related quality control data. ABSTRACT_SHIFTER Information related abstract shifter. TOXPRINT_FINGERPRINT ToxPrint chemoinformatics fingerprint chemical. ACTOR_REPORT Aggregated Computational Toxicology Resource (ACTOR) report chemical. SYNONYM_IDENTIFIER Identifiers synonyms chemical. RELATED_RELATIONSHIP Information related chemicals. ASSOCIATED_TOXCAST_ASSAYS Assays associated chemical ToxCast database. TOXVAL_DETAILS Details toxicological values. CHEMICAL_PROPERTIES_DETAILS Details chemical properties. BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_TEST_PRED Predicted bioconcentration factor tests. BOILING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted boiling point degrees Celsius tests. 48HR_DAPHNIA_LC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted 48-hour LC50 Daphnia mol/L tests. DENSITY_G/CM^3_TEST_PRED Predicted density g/cm³ tests. DEVTOX_TEST_PRED Predicted developmental toxicity tests. 96HR_FATHEAD_MINNOW_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted 96-hour LC50 fathead minnow mol/L tests. FLASH_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted flash point degrees Celsius tests. MELTING_POINT_DEGC_TEST_PRED Predicted melting point degrees Celsius tests. AMES_MUTAGENICITY_TEST_PRED Predicted Ames mutagenicity tests. ORAL_RAT_LD50_MOL/KG_TEST_PRED Predicted oral LD50 rats mol/kg tests. SURFACE_TENSION_DYN/CM_TEST_PRED Predicted surface tension dyn/cm tests. THERMAL_CONDUCTIVITY_MW_M×K_TEST_PRED Predicted thermal conductivity mW/m×K tests. TETRAHYMENA_PYRIFORMIS_IGC50_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted IGC50 Tetrahymena pyriformis mol/L tests. VISCOSITY_CP_CP_TEST_PRED Predicted viscosity cP tests. VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_TEST_PRED Predicted vapor pressure mmHg tests. WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_TEST_PRED Predicted water solubility mol/L tests. ATMOSPHERIC_HYDROXYLATION_RATE_\(AOH\)_CM3/MOLECULE\*SEC_OPERA_PRED Predicted atmospheric hydroxylation rate cm³/molecule\*sec OPERA. BIOCONCENTRATION_FACTOR_OPERA_PRED Predicted bioconcentration factor OPERA. BIODEGRADATION_HALF_LIFE_DAYS_DAYS_OPERA_PRED Predicted biodegradation half-life days OPERA. BOILING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED Predicted boiling point degrees Celsius OPERA. HENRYS_LAW_ATM-M3/MOLE_OPERA_PRED Predicted Henry's law constant atm-m³/mole OPERA. OPERA_KM_DAYS_OPERA_PRED Predicted Km days OPERA. OCTANOL_AIR_PARTITION_COEFF_LOGKOA_OPERA_PRED Predicted octanol-air partition coefficient (log Koa) OPERA. SOIL_ADSORPTION_COEFFICIENT_KOC_L/KG_OPERA_PRED Predicted soil adsorption coefficient (Koc) L/kg OPERA. OCTANOL_WATER_PARTITION_LOGP_OPERA_PRED Predicted octanol-water partition coefficient (log P) OPERA. MELTING_POINT_DEGC_OPERA_PRED Predicted melting point degrees Celsius OPERA. OPERA_PKAA_OPERA_PRED Predicted pKa (acidic) OPERA. OPERA_PKAB_OPERA_PRED Predicted pKa (basic) OPERA. VAPOR_PRESSURE_MMHG_OPERA_PRED Predicted vapor pressure mmHg OPERA. WATER_SOLUBILITY_MOL/L_OPERA_PRED Predicted water solubility mol/L OPERA. EXPOCAST_MEDIAN_EXPOSURE_PREDICTION_MG/KG-BW/DAY Predicted median exposure ExpoCast mg/kg-bw/day. NHANES National Health Nutrition Examination Survey data. TOXCAST_NUMBER_OF_ASSAYS/TOTAL Number assays ToxCast. TOXCAST_PERCENT_ACTIVE Percentage active assays ToxCast. mass_error Numeric value indicating mass error tolerance searches involving mass data. Default 0. verify_ssl Logical value indicating whether SSL certificates verified. Default FALSE. Note argument used linux OS. xlsx_file Path file write results. base_url Comptox url. ... Additional arguments passed httr2::req_options(). Note argument used linux OS.

what: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
text: function queries Comparative Toxicogenomics Database API retrieve data related chemicals, diseases, genes, categories.

title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
code: extr_ctd(   input_terms,   category = "chem",   report_type = "genes_curated",   input_term_search_type = "directAssociations",   action_types = NULL,   ontology = NULL,   verify_ssl = FALSE,   ... )

title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
text: input_terms character vector input terms CAS numbers IUPAC names. category string specifying category data query. Valid options "", "chem", "disease", "gene", "go", "pathway", "reference", "taxon". Default "chem". report_type string specifying type report return. Default "genes_curated". Valid options include: "cgixns" Curated chemical-gene interactions. Requires least one action_types parameter. "chems" chemical associations. "chems_curated" Curated chemical associations. "chems_inferred" Inferred chemical associations. "genes" gene associations. "genes_curated" Curated gene associations. "genes_inferred" Inferred gene associations. "diseases" disease associations. "diseases_curated" Curated disease associations. "diseases_inferred" Inferred disease associations. "pathways_curated" Curated pathway associations. "pathways_inferred" Inferred pathway associations. "pathways_enriched" Enriched pathway associations. "phenotypes_curated" Curated phenotype associations. "phenotypes_inferred" Inferred phenotype associations. "go" Gene Ontology (GO) associations. Requires least one ontology parameter. "go_enriched" Enriched GO associations. Requires least one ontology parameter. input_term_search_type string specifying search method use. Options "hierarchicalAssociations" "directAssociations". Default "directAssociations". action_types optional character vector specifying one interaction types filtering results. Default "". acceptable inputs "abundance", "activity", "binding", "cotreatment", "expression", "folding", "localization", "metabolic processing"...See https://ctdbase.org/tools/batchQuery.go full list. ontology optional character vector specifying one ontologies filtering GO reports. Default NULL. verify_ssl Boolean control SSL verified . ... arguments supplied req_option thus libcurl.

title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
text: data frame containing queried data CSV format.

title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
text: Comparative Toxicogenomics Database: http://ctdbase.org Davis, . P., Grondin, C. J., Johnson, R. J., Sciaky, D., McMorran, R., Wiegers, T. C., & Mattingly, C. J. (2019). Comparative Toxicogenomics Database: update 2019. Nucleic acids research, 47(D1), D948–D954. doi:10.1093/nar/gky868

title: Extract Data from the CTD API — extr_ctd
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ input_terms <- c("50-00-0", "64-17-5", "methanal", "ethanol") dat <- extr_ctd(   input_terms = input_terms,   category = "chem",   report_type = "genes_curated",   input_term_search_type = "directAssociations",   action_types = "ANY",   ontology = c("go_bp", "go_cc") ) str(dat)  # Get expresssion data dat2 <- extr_ctd(   input_terms = input_terms,   report_type = "cgixns",   category = "chem",   action_types = "expression" )  str(dat2) } # }

what: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
title: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
text: extr_iris function sends request EPA IRIS database search information based specified keywords cancer types. retrieves parses HTML content response. Note keywords provide dataset retrieved.

title: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
text: casrn single character string specifying CASRN search. cancer_types character vector specifying types cancer include search. Must either "non_cancer" "cancer".

title: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
text: data frame containing extracted data.

title: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris
text: Please note function, pulls data EPA servers, may encounter issues Linux systems. servers accept secure legacy renegotiation. Linux systems, current function depends curl OpenSSL, known problems unsafe legacy renegotiation newer versions. One workaround downgrade curl v7.78.0 OpenSSL v1.1.1. However, please aware using older versions might introduce potential security vulnerabilities. Refer gist instructions downgrade curl OpenSSL Ubuntu.

title: Extract Data from EPA IRIS Database — extr_iris

what: Extract Tetramer Data from the CTD API — extr_tetramer

code: extr_tetramer(   chem,   disease = "",   gene = "",   go = "",   input_term_search_type = "directAssociations",   qt_match_type = "equals",   verify_ssl = FALSE,   ... )

title: Extract Tetramer Data from the CTD API — extr_tetramer
text: chem string indicating chemical identifiers CAS number IUPAC name chemical. disease string indicating disease term. Default empty string. gene string indicating gene symbol. Default empty string. go string indicating Gene Ontology term. Default empty string. input_term_search_type string specifying search method use. Options "hierarchicalAssociations" "directAssociations". Default "directAssociations". qt_match_type string specifying query type match method. Options "equals" "contains". Default "equals". verify_ssl Boolean control SSL verified . Default FALSE. ... arguments supplied req_option thus libcurl.

Options "hierarchicalAssociations" "directAssociations". Default "directAssociations". qt_match_type string specifying query type match method. Options "equals" "contains". what: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
title: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
text: wrapper function retrieves toxicological information specified chemicals calling several external functions query multiple databases, including PubChem, Integrated Chemical Environment (ICE), CompTox Chemicals Dashboard, Integrated Risk Information System (IRIS).

title: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
text: casrn character vector CAS Registry Numbers (CASRN) representing chemicals interest.

title: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
text: list data frames containing toxicological information retrieved database: ghs_dat Toxicity data PubChem's Globally Harmonized System (GHS) classification. comptox_list List toxicity information CompTox Chemicals Dashboard. ice_dat Assay data Integrated Chemical Environment (ICE) database. iris Risk assessment data IRIS database.

title: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
text: Specifically, function: Calls extr_pubchem_ghs retrieve GHS classification data PubChem. Calls extr_comptox retrieve data CompTox Chemicals Dashboard. Calls extr_ice gather assay data ICE database. Calls extr_iris retrieve risk assessment information IRIS database.

title: Extract Toxicological Information from Multiple Databases — extr_tox
